import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Popup from "reactjs-popup"; import NameInput from "./partials/NameInput"; import styles from "./index.module.scss"; function PollScene() { let { pollId } = useParams(); return ( <>
{/*

Requested topic ID: {pollId}

*/} Open Modal } modal defaultOpen={!window.localStorage.getItem("loggedUser")} closeOnDocumentClick={false} className="my-popup-content" contentStyle={{ width: "400px", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", }} > {(close) => }
test
); } export default PollScene;
